importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when Netflix announced the new Kennedy family series, marking the official unveiling of the project to the public.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The narrative of the series spans from the 1930s to 1956, beginning with the early life of Joe and Rose Kennedy and covering the formative years of the Kennedy family before John F. Kennedy’s presidency.

keyTakeAways: A new Netflix drama series titled 'Kennedy' is set to debut, focusing on the Kennedy family's rise and struggles.
Michael Fassbender will star as Joe Kennedy, Sr., the patriarch of the family, portraying his journey and the lives of his nine children.
The series is based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956,' offering a nuanced, human-centered look behind the Kennedy mythos.
The story begins in the 1930s and follows the 'improbable ascent' of Joe and Rose Kennedy, including Jack's struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother, Robert F. Kennedy.
The series is described as blending American mythology with historical depth, providing insight into both the Kennedy family and broader American history.
It is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story,' which centers on JFK Jr., and will consist of eight episodes with no release date confirmed yet.

namedEntities.name: Netflix
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Netflix is the producer and distributor of the new Kennedy family series, indicating its role in bringing a major historical drama to a wide international audience.

namedEntities.name: Michael Fassbender
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is cast in the lead role as Joe Kennedy, Sr., bringing his acclaimed acting to a dramatization of a pivotal American political family.

namedEntities.name: Fredrik Logevall
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Author of a biography on the Kennedy family
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His book 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956' serves as the basis for the series, lending historical credibility and depth to the narrative.

namedEntities.name: Joe Kennedy, Sr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The patriarch of the Kennedy family
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is the central figure in the series, representing the foundational figure of the Kennedy dynasty and the origin point of the family's political ascent.

namedEntities.name: Rose Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The matriarch of the Kennedy family
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: She is part of the core family depicted, with the series charting the rise of Joe and Rose and their nine children, emphasizing family dynamics and legacy.

namedEntities.name: John F. Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: 35th U.S. President, son of Joe and Rose Kennedy
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His rise to the presidency and subsequent assassination are part of the historical backdrop that shapes the family’s legacy and the show’s narrative.

namedEntities.name: Robert F. Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Second son of Joe and Rose Kennedy, a U.S. Senator and presidential hopeful
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is portrayed as a rebellious figure who struggles against the shadow of his brother Jack, adding depth to the family's internal dynamics.

namedEntities.name: JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Son of John F. Kennedy, who died in a plane crash in 1999
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His tragic death, along with his wife and sister-in-law, reinforces the 'Kennedy curse' narrative and contributes to the emotional weight of the family’s history.

namedEntities.name: Ryan Murphy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Producer of a separate upcoming series
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is associated with a different Kennedy-related series, 'American Love Story,' which helps differentiate the new Netflix series and avoids confusion.

namedEntities.name: Sam Shaw
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is responsible for shaping the series' narrative and has described the show as a blend of American mythology and historical insight.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography, which will star Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr. The series begins in the 1930s and follows the rise and struggles of the Kennedy family, including the complex dynamics between Jack and Robert F. Kennedy. It explores both the triumphs and tragedies of the family, drawing on historical events such as JFK’s assassination and the plane crash that killed JFK Jr. The show aims to humanize the Kennedy dynasty, offering a nuanced portrayal that blends American mythology with real historical context. It is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story' and will consist of eight episodes, though a release date has not yet been set.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
